free_text.Bibliography and material: Wakerly, Digital Design, 3rd Ed., Prentice Hall, 2000[br/]Patterson and Hennessy, Computer Organization & Design, 3rd Ed., Morgan Kaufmann, 2005[br/]
free_text.Content: [li]	Complex digital systems in VHDL[br/][li]	Basic components of a computer[br/][li]	Instruction Set Architectures[br/][li]	Assembly-level programming[br/][li]	Multi-cycle implementation of processors[br/][li]	Caches[br/][li]	Virtual memory
free_text.Learning outcomes: Master the design of complex digital system at the register transfer level using logic synthesis tools and simulators. Understand the fundamentals of modern computer organization and in particular basic processor architecture and assembly level programming.

en.title: Computer architecture I
en.library_recommends:
• "Computer organization and design : the hardware/software interface / David A. Patterson, John L. Hennessy ; with a contribution by Peter J. Ashenden ... [et al.]". Year:2012. ISBN:978-0-12-374750-1
  • "Digital design : principles and practices / John F. Wakerly". Year:2006. ISBN:0-13-186389-4

free_text.Bibliographie et matériel: John F. Wakerly, Digital design: principles and practices, 4th edition, 2005.[br/]David A. Patterson and John L. Hennessy, Computer organization and design: the hardware/software interface, 4th edition, 2011.[br/]
free_text.Contenu: [li]	Systèmes logiques complexes en VHDL[br/][li]	Composants de base d'un ordinateur[br/][li]	Architecture au niveau du répertoire d'instructions[br/][li]	Programmation en assembleur[br/][li]	Implémentation multi-cycle des processeurs[br/][li]	Caches[br/][li]	Mémoire virtuelle
free_text.Préparation pour: Architecture des ordinateurs II[br/]Architecture des ordinateurs avancée[br/]
free_text.Objectifs d'apprentissage: Concevoir au niveau RTL de systèmes digitaux complexes en utilisant des outils de synthèse logique et des simulateurs. Comprendre l'organisation des ordinateurs modernes et en particulier l'architecture des processeurs et la programmation assembleur.

fr.title: Architecture des ordinateurs I
